wf_abc123.name: UCI Library Room Booking
wf_abc123.description: Best-effort automated booking flow for UCI Libraries rooms using LibCal/Springshare UI patterns.

parameters.description: Library location dropdown value (for example: Gateway Study Center, Science Library, Langson Library).
Time slot label text to click (must match visible slot text)
Meeting duration in minutes (UCI allows 30-minute increments up to 120 per day)
Purpose for Reservation COVID-19 dropdown value

steps.description: Open UCI Libraries spaces page
Wait for page content to appear
Allow room grid and scripts to fully initialize
Select library from Location dropdown
Wait for room list to refresh for selected library
Open room details page directly
Wait for room page booking grid to load
steps.until_text_visible: First select a start time from the grid below

steps.description: Select room start slot on room page
Wait briefly for end-time controls to appear
Select end time from dropdown based on computed duration
steps.css_selector_hint: select[name*='end'], select[id*='end'], select[name*='to'], select[id*='to'], select[aria-label*='End'], select[aria-label*='To']

steps.description: Wait for selected slot state to apply
Click Submit Times to proceed to booking form
steps.css_selector_hint: button#submit_times, button[name='submit_times'], button.btn-submit-times, input[value='Submit Times'], button[type='submit']

steps.description: Wait for checkout form after Submit Times
Select Affiliation option
Select Purpose for Reservation COVID-19 option
Capture filled reservation form before submission
Submit my booking
Wait for confirmation state
Capture post-submit confirmation view
